Title: The vita la vitaâ„¢ guide to Effective Clinkz

ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Builds into Ring of Basilius at side shop
ItemTooltips.robe: We prefer the components of the Orchid which will help out with mana issues in the early game.
ItemTooltips.boots: Boots of Speed are fine until after Orchid - prioritize rushing your Orchid
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Early game option for laning phase depending on how often the enemy is casting
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Swap your treads to INT when casting your ultimate, both to help offset the relatively high mana cost, and to get more healing out of the ability.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: When you're ready to create your second Oblivion Staff to go into Orchid, split this ring up to use the Sage's Mask.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Rushing Orchid is a must. This item is what allows you to become one of the most feared solo gankers in the game.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Good candidate for 4th core item depending on the heroes you're up against.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Helpful for early game, easy to build into with random gold, though not absolutely necessary.

AbilityTooltips.clinkz_strafe:
We only need 1 level of Strafe at level 8 because this should be about the time that we get Orchid. 4 seconds of attack speed is more than enough time to kill an enemy hero.

Before Orchid, we do not have the mana pool to support Strafe, so put it off until the Orchid comes out.
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_searing_arrows:
Wait until you get to lane to determine if you can grab Searing Arrows at level 1 - if you are against a lane that is looking for a level 1 first blood, opt for Skeleton Walk.

This build prioritizes Searing Arrows for the huge damage it gives you early on. Make sure to orb walk!
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_wind_walk:
Wait until you get to lane to determine if you can grab Searing Arrows at level 1 - if you are against a lane that is looking for a level 1 first blood, opt for Skeleton Walk.

We prioritize Skeleton Walk over Strafe. The movespeed/duration bonus allows permanent invisibility and high mobility
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_death_pact:
Most of the time, you want to be eating a large creep in the jungle to get the most out of this ability. We rush mana/intelligence items in order to support casting this ability nearly every cooldown.

Can be used to control lane position for static farming by eating a friendly creep.
